root.name: Age of Conan: Rise of the Godslayer
root.description: OverviewAge of Conan:Â Rise of the Godslayer is the first expansion for Age of Conan: Hyborian Adventures. It adds a new continent, Khitai; a new playable race, the Khitain; a new Alternate Advancement system; new areas for levels 20-40 and 80 ; new raids; a faction system; new mounts; as well as a number of other changes. The level cap remains the same, 80.
